Line [] edu.ou.asgbook.transforms.HoughTransform.findLines ( LatLonGrid  grid,
int  datathresh 
)

Find best lines that connect points > thresh.

Parameters:
grid 
datathresh 
Returns:
00099                                                              {
00100         int maxr = grid.getNumLat() + grid.getNumLon();
00101         int numr = (int) Math.round(maxr / DELTA_RHO);
00102         int numtheta = (int) Math.round(360 / DELTA_THETA);
00103 
00104         // update vote
00105         Line[] lines = new Line[numr * numtheta];
00106         for (int i=0; i < lines.length; ++i){
00107             lines[i] = new Line();
00108         }
00109         for (int i = 0; i < grid.getNumLat(); ++i) {
00110             for (int j = 0; j < grid.getNumLon(); ++j) {
00111                 if (grid.getValue(i, j) > datathresh) {
00112                     // use this point to cast votes ...
00113                     for (int theta = 0; theta < numtheta; ++theta) {
00114                         double theta_radians = (theta * DELTA_THETA * Math.PI) / 180.0;
00115                         double rho = i * Math.cos(theta_radians) + j
00116                                 * Math.sin(theta_radians);
00117                         int r = (int) Math.round(rho / DELTA_RHO);
00118                         if (r >= 0 && r < maxr) {
00119                             Line line = lines[r * numtheta + theta];
00120                             line.rho = rho;
00121                             line.theta = theta_radians;
00122                             line.numVotes++;
00123                             line.x1 = Math.min(line.x1, i);
00124                             line.x2 = Math.max(line.x2, i);
00125                             line.y1 = Math.min(line.y1, j);
00126                             line.y2 = Math.max(line.y2, j);
00127                         }
00128                     }
00129                 }
00130             }
00131         }
00132 
00133         // sort the lines by vote
00134         Arrays.sort(lines);
00135         return lines;
00136     }

00139         // create output directory
00140         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("hough");
00141 
00142         // read input
00143         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00144         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00145 
00146         // fill in
00147         popdensity = new DilateErodeFilter(2,3).filter(popdensity);
00148         popdensity = new ErosionFilter(3).filter(popdensity);
00149         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "filledin", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00150         
00151         // skeletonize
00152         LatLonGrid skel = HilditchSkeletonization.findSkeleton(popdensity, 300, out);
00153         KmlWriter.write(skel, out, "skel", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00154 
00155         // find lines
00156         HoughTransform hough = new HoughTransform();
00157         HoughTransform.Line[] lines = hough.findLines(skel, 0);
00158         final int NBEST = 3;
00159         for (int i=0; i < Math.min(lines.length,NBEST); ++i){ // NBEST lines
00160             HoughTransform.Line line = lines[i];
00161             System.out.println(line);
00162             List<Pixel> pixels = line.computePixels(popdensity.getNumLat(), popdensity.getNumLon());
00163             for (Pixel p : pixels){
00164                 popdensity.setValue(p.getX(), p.getY(), 1000);
00165             }
00166         }
00167         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "lines",
00168                 PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00169     }
